alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 1:50PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with higher amounts above 9,000 feet. Accumulations of 3 to 5 inches through South Pass. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph in the highest peaks. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially through South Pass and Red Canyon. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
